data.name: Standard Variable Home Loan - Interest Only
data.description: Our variable rate home loan comes with a flexible interest rate that allows you to pay it off sooner.

features.additionalInfo: Split up to 4 accounts with a minimum split amount of $20,000 per account.

eligibility.additionalValue: Must be an Australian resident. A resident is either a citizen or permanent resident of Australia.

fees.name: Application Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable on or before settlement, and includes the cost of valuation(s) on the property of up to $500. If the valuation cost exceeds $500 you must pay the excess.

fees.name: Account keeping Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Account keeping fee applies to all variable and fixed rate accounts.

fees.name: Settlement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable on or before settlement for attendance by Citi's solicitor(s) and for completing all Land Title Office requirements.

fees.name: Company/Third Party Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable when a company or third party applies for the loan and provides security. This is payable per company and/or third party.

fees.name: Non Standard Security Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee may apply where the offered security is not a standard security type.

fees.name: Additional Property Security Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Additional legal fees are payable where more than one security is offered. This fee is payable for each additional security offered.

fees.name: Re-documentation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies where you request a change and we need to prepare new loan documents.

fees.name: Overdue Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: An overdue payment fee of $20 will be charged on your home loan if we have not received your full monthly repayment. The fee is payable at 15 days, 30 days, 45 days, and 60 days after the due date for payment while the payment remains overdue

fees.name: Credit Limit re-arrangement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where the credit limits between your accounts are re-arranged, and does not result in an increase to your overall facility credit limit.

fees.name: Split accounts Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where you request us to split your loan into additional accounts, not exceeding four accounts per loan

fees.name: Product Change Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where there is a product change to your existing loan, e.g.:covert your existing loan to another product type (eg. Standard Variable to Standard Fixed), or to another repayment option, or extend an interest only period. A fixed rate break charge may also apply if switching from a fixed rate during the fixed rate period

fees.name: Full Discharge Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when any loan is fully discharged. A Discharge Registration Fee is also payable by you to the relevant land titles registration body, when you register a full discharge of your Citi mortgage

fees.name: Partial Discharge Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $350 (plus any valuation cost). Payable when any loan is partially discharged. Citi may perform a valuation on the property the subject of a security when assessing this request. If we do so, you must pay the fee plus any valuation costs. A Discharge Registration Fee is also payable to the relevant land titles registration body when you register a partial discharge of your Citi mortgage.
